main event: A witness observed a brilliant white light moving very fast in the sky over Tonawanda, New York on September 7-29, 1965.
interesting points: The object was described as longer than it was wide,It was observed for about 20 seconds, though the duration may have been overestimated by the witness,The object moved straight up without any lights showing after initially hovering,There was no discernible noise during the sighting,The object was estimated to be at an altitude of approximately 325-350 feet.
witness description: A civilian witness who observed the object in clear sky conditions.
